project.description: This project used to publish cla backend server

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Namespace
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: openlookeng: robot-gitee-openlookeng openeuler: robot-gitee-openeuler opengauss: robot-gitee-opengauss

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash set -exo pipefail
export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/go/bin
git_clone() { local url=$1 local branch=$2 local repo=$3 local msg=""
test -n "$branch" && branch="-b $branch"
for i in {1..3}; do msg=$(git clone $branch $url) test $? -eq 0 && return 0
sleep $((RANDOM%15+5)) rm -fr $repo done
echo $msg return 1 }
repo_dir=$(basename $Robot_Repo_URL) repo_dir=${repo_dir%.git}
branch=$(echo $Robot_Repo_Branch | awk '{print tolower($0)}')
git_clone $Robot_Repo_URL $branch $repo_dir
cd $repo_dir
export BRANCH_OVERRIDE="${branch}" echo $BRANCH_OVERRIDE
if hash docker 2>/dev/null; then docker login -u cn-north-4@$DOCKER_USER -p $DOCKER_PASS swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com else echo "docker not installed." exit 1 fi
./build.sh push_image
image_id=$(./publish/command_status.sh | grep IMAGE_ID | awk '{print $2}')
bot_name=$(./publish/command_status.sh | grep CODE_REPOSITORY | awk '{print $2}') echo $bot_name bot_name=${bot_name#"robot-gitee-"}
contains(){ local key=$1 echo $(grep $key ./*.go) }
events="" test -n "$(contains RegisterIssueHandler)" && events="$events,Issue Hook" test -n "$(contains RegisterPullRequestHandler)" && events="$events,Merge Request Hook" test -n "$(contains RegisterPushEventHandler)" && events="$events,Push Hook" test -n "$(contains RegisterNoteEventHandler)" && events="$events,Note Hook" events=${events#","}
wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/opensourceways/infra-mindspore/master/applications/deploy-robot-gitee/deploy.sh -O deploy.sh
chmod +x deploy.sh
# head -n 10 deploy.sh
./deploy.sh init $bot_name "$image_id" "$events" "$Namespace" "$GIT_USER" "$GIT_PASS" "chenzeng765@gmail.com"
